hero.title: Potrero de los Funes
hero.subtitle: Explore the winter paradise in the mountains of San Luis
hero.winter_text: Experience the serenity of winter in Potrero de los Funes

sections.nature_adventure: Nature, adventure and winter serenity in one place
sections.discover_winter: Discover everything Potrero de los Funes has to offer during this winter season
sections.plan_visit: Plan your visit to Potrero de los Funes and live an unforgettable experience surrounded by the serenity of the mountain winter.
sections.winter_activities_desc: Discover unique experiences during winter in Potrero de los Funes. Live the serenity and beauty of the mountain cold in an incomparable natural environment.

activities.morning_walks_desc: Enjoy trails covered with morning frost and breathe the pure winter air
activities.winter_photography_desc: Capture the unique beauty of the lake with crystal reflections and the mountains covered with frozen dew
activities.lake_bonfires_desc: Warm up by the fire while contemplating the calm waters on winter nights
activities.cold_adventures_desc: Explore the trails with the fresh winter air and live the serenity of the season
activities.mountain_exploration_desc: Discover the secrets of the Puntana mountains with specialized guides in winter season

info.how_to_arrive_desc: Just 20 km from San Luis city. Access via Serranías Puntanas Highway.
info.weather_desc: Cool and dry weather with frosty mornings. Ideal for outdoor activities and contemplating crystalline winter landscapes.

footer.winter_enjoy: Enjoy winter in Potrero de los Funes!
